00031 namespace RDK2 { namespace SensorData {
00032 
00036 struct LaserData: public BaseSensorData {
00037 
00039     RDK2::Geometry::Point3od laserPose;
00040     
00042     double minReading, maxReading;
00043     
00045     double minTheta, maxTheta;
00046     
00048     double roll;
00049 
00051     double pitch;
00052     
00053     double laserPan;
00054     
00055     struct LaserPoint {
00057         double theta;
00058         
00061         double reading;
00062         double intensity;
00063         
00067         double trueAlpha;
00068         
00070         LaserPoint() : theta(NAN) { markInvalid(); }
00071 
00074         inline bool isValid() const { return reading != 0; }
00075         
00077         void markInvalid()
00078         {
00079             reading=0; 
00080             intensity=NAN;
00081             trueAlpha=NAN;
00082         }
00083         
00084         bool hasTrueAlpha() const { return trueAlpha != NAN; }
00085         
00087         RDK2::Geometry::PolarPoint ppoint() const { return RDK2::Geometry::PolarPoint(theta, reading); }
00088     };
00089     
00090     typedef std::vector<LaserPoint> LaserPoints;
00091     LaserPoints points;
00092     
00094     LaserData() : BaseSensorData("FLASER") {
00095         // Fill with "safe" values
00096         minReading = 0; 
00097         maxReading = 0; // FIXME: AC: non dovrebbe essere a +INF
00098         minTheta = -M_PI/2; 
00099         maxTheta = +M_PI/2; 
00100     }
00101     
00102     
00104 
00106     void mm2m();
00107     
00111     inline void setLaserRollPitchYaw(double roll=0, double pitch=0, double yaw=0){laserPose.theta=roll; laserPose.phi=pitch; laserPose.gamma=yaw;}
00112     
00116     inline double getLaserRoll(){return laserPose.theta;}
00117     
00121     inline double getLaserPitch(){return laserPose.phi;}
00122     
00126     inline double getLaserYaw(){return laserPose.gamma;}
00127     
00128     
00137     inline int getNearestIndex(double theta) const
00138     { return (int) round((theta - minTheta) / getRayWidth()); }
00139     
00145     inline double getRayWidth() const
00146     { return (maxTheta - minTheta) / (points.size() - 1); }
00147     
00152     void updateThetas();
00153     
00155     double minRange() const;
00156     
00157     //Returns angle associated to minimum range
00158     int getMinAngle();
00159     
00161     bool raysEqualTo(const LaserData&ld);
00162 
00164     int numValidPoints() const;
00165 
00167     bool isInsideClearArea(RDK2::Geometry::Point2d world) const;
00168 
00171     
00174 
00176     RDK2::Geometry::DMatrixD getFisherForXY();
00177     
00179     double getFisherForTheta();
00180     
00182     RDK2::Geometry::DMatrixD getFisher();
00183 
00185     RDK2::Geometry::DMatrixD getFisher(double sigma) {
00186         return getFisher() * (1/(sigma*sigma)); 
00187     }
00188 
00190     RDK2::Geometry::DMatrixD getCRB(double sigma) 
00191         throw(RDK2::Geometry::DNotInvertibleMatrixException)
00192     {
00193         return getFisher(sigma).inv(); 
00194     }
00195 
00196     
00200     
00204     void copy(const LaserData&);
00205     static LaserParser laserParser;
00206     Parser* getParser() const ;
00207 };
